Concept.Comments: Warning Message: Some Exams are in use
Concept.String: Warning: some of the selected exams are currently opened by another process: cannot open it.

Concept.Comments: [StoryID: 22808]Warning Message: An error occurred while saving a configuration file.
Concept.String: Warning: Unable to save Virtual Navigator configuration.

Concept.Comments: [StoryID: 22808]Warning Message: An error occurred while loading configuration file.
Concept.String: Warning: Unable to load Virtual Navigator configuration.

Concept.Comments: [StoryID: 22960]Warning Message: An error occurred while saving a 3D Volume file.
Concept.String: Warning: Unable to save Virtual Navigator 3D Volume.

Concept.Comments: [StoryID: 22960]Warning Message: An error occurred while loading a 3D Volume file.
Concept.String: Warning: Unable to load Virtual Navigator 3D Volume.

Concept.Comments: [DefectID: 26992]Warning Message: Closing the exam the fusion data shall be deleted. Do you want to continue?
Concept.String: Closing the exam the fusion data shall be deleted. Do you want to continue?
